attributes.label: Frontpage
attributes.description: All content promoted to the front page.

area_text_custom.content:
No front page content has been created yet.
Follow the User Guide to start building your site.
No moderated content available. Only pending versions of content, such as drafts, are listed here.

attributes.label: Who's new
attributes.description: Shows a list of the newest user accounts on the site.

attributes.label: Who's online block
attributes.description: Shows the user names of the most recently active users, and the total number of active users.

expose.label: Last access
expose.description: A user is considered online for this long after they have last viewed a page.

display_options.display_description: A list of users that are currently logged in.
